name: Alone Or Together
description:
Multi-flatformer Game

This Genre is Puzzle & Cooperation Game.

Our game is a game in which two people work together to clear a total of three stages.

Start with a tutorial and test your teamwork!

This game can be a game of friendship or betrayal for each other!

Also, try various plays in situations where you are at a crossroads of many choices.

There are situations where you have to use your brain, including maze content.

Share these situations with a friend you want to play with!

It will be an attractive experience.

Special Thanks AOT team members
